title: Ping button
body: I feel like adding some sort of button or something somewhere in the client to show your ping would be rather helpful. Some people may be having slight connection issues and not know it so seeing ping when in lobby or a pop-up when you hit start may be a nice way to stop people from joining then blaming lag all game.

replies.body: Yeah, the client could give the players advices that if their internet condition is suitable for a game.
